item.title: Pixel Watch 3 adds a life-saving ‘loss of pulse’ detection feature
item.dc:creator: Sarah Perez
item.description:
With the introduction of the Pixel Watch 3 smartwatches, which now come in two sizes, Google is also introducing a new, potentially life-saving feature: loss of pulse detection. At the Made by Google 2024 event Tuesday, the company announced the watch’s added ability to sense this particular health emergency alongside other new tools and features, […]

item.title: Pixel phones get an AI-powered weather app

item.description:

item.description:
The Made by Google 2024 event has reached an end, after a busy rumor mill preceding the event, we have the full range of announcements and reveals from Google’s biggest hardware event of the year. item.title: Threads may offer its own take on Fleets with a disappearing posts feature
item.dc:creator: Sarah Perez
item.description:
Meta has been spotted working on a new feature that would allow a post — as well as all its replies — to disappear in 24 hours.

item.title: The Tesla Diner might actually be happening
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Bellan
item.description:
In line with Elon Musk’s increasing rhetoric on X of going back to the good old days, Tesla looks like it’s finally getting ready to open its 1950s-style diner.  Tesla is seeking a Tesla Diner Experience Specialist in Los Angeles to work with the charging operations team to ensure “exceptional customer experience at the Tesla […]

item.title: Google adds new AI-powered features for photo editing and image generation
item.dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
item.description:
Google is adding features for photo editing, plus new apps for storing and searching through screenshots on-device and an AI-powered studio for image generation.

item.description:

item.description:

item.dc:creator: Kyle Wiggers
item.description:
Gemini Live lets users have "in-depth" voice chats with Gemini, Google's generative AI-powered chatbot, on their smartphones.

item.description:

item.title: US appeals court rules geofence warrants are unconstitutional
item.dc:creator: Zack Whittaker
item.description:
The U.S. Appeals Court for the Fifth Circuit said geofence search warrants are "categorically prohibited" under the Fourth Amendment.

item.title: Encord lands new cash to grow its data dev tools for AI
item.dc:creator: Kyle Wiggers
item.description:
Labeling and annotation platforms might not get the attention flashy new generative AI models do. But they’re essential. The data on which many models train must be labeled, or the models wouldn’t be able to interpret that data during the training process. Annotation is a vast undertaking, requiring thousands to millions of annotations for the […]

item.title: Singaporean investment app Syfe pulls in $27M to hasten growth in Asia Pacific
item.dc:creator: Kate Park
item.description:
The Asia Pacific region has long been an important market for wealth management firms with the plethora of developing economies and a burgeoning retail investment market. But there’s still a huge market to capture: About 40% to 45% of personal financial assets in the region are held in cash and deposits as of 2023, according […]

item.title: Twitch rolls out video stories to challenge Instagram
item.dc:creator: Aisha Malik
item.description:
After launching photo and text stories last year, Twitch is now introducing video stories. Streamers can now film 60-second videos in the Twitch mobile app or upload a video from their camera roll. Twitch sees the new feature as a way for streamers to take viewers with them when they’re on the go and away […]

item.title: California AI bill SB 1047 aims to prevent AI disasters, but Silicon Valley warns it will cause one

item.description:
SB 1047 has drawn the ire of Silicon Valley players large and small, including venture capitalists, big tech trade groups, researchers and startup founders.
